name: Magical Epiphany
text: Your faith allows you to prepare a spell when you need it.
prerequisites: Ability to prepare spells, worshiper of Nethys.
benefit: Once per day, you can prepare a spell in an open spell slot as a standard action.
prerequisites_zh: 准备施法者，信仰内希斯。
benefit_zh: 每天一次，你可以通过一个标准动作在一个空置的法术位中准备法术。
